name: Game Time Glizzys
description:
Game Time Glizzy's is a casual cooking simulator where you must manage your money, sabotage your competitors, serve swarms of angry customers and pay back a mountain of debt to keep your concession stand alive.

Ahh the hot dog. A staple of the American diet. The most popular dish at back-yard barbeques, stadiums and Fourth of July parties. Some kids wanted to be astronauts, firemen when they grew up. But not you. You've wanted to share your love of hot dogs with the world. You've dreamed of opening up your own stand at the local big-league Stadium or starting your own hot dog empire by franchising stores all over the country.

To date, you've taken several high-interest loans and racked up credit card bills to open your first stand at the local hockey rink. After several unfortunate events, your stand is now in disarray. Broken appliances, strong competition and rising costs. Worst of all, the debt collectors are calling and they need to be paid. You have 10 days to pay them back or your dream is dead.

Can you dig yourself out of debt and start the hot dog empire you've always dreamed of?
